comment.author: 65207713@N05
comment._content: Anthony's photographer, Thomas C. Roche at Chaffin's Farm, Va. 1864. Roche is standing outside his winter quarters, "Hotel De Roche." (zoom)

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you Funkybuddy for the information about Thomas Roche.  Could you give us a source for your identification?

comment.author: 65207713@N05
comment._content: He's put his name on the building directly behind him. However, he's not at Chaffin's, he's at an abandoned farmhouse near Butler's Canal. My bad. Roche can be seen in several of his Petersburg series, photographed alone and also with his teamster.
